member.summary: No border.

member.summary: A dashed border.

member.name: F:XComponent.SliderBar.MACBorderStyle.Dotted
member.summary: A dotted-line border.

member.name: F:XComponent.SliderBar.MACBorderStyle.Inset
member.summary: A sunken border.

member.name: F:XComponent.SliderBar.MACBorderStyle.Outset
member.summary: A raised border.

member.name: F:XComponent.SliderBar.MACBorderStyle.Solid
member.summary: A solid border.

member.name: F:XComponent.SliderBar.MACBorderStyle.Adjust
member.summary: The border is drawn outside the specified rectangle, preserving the dimensions of the rectangle for drawing.

member.name: F:XComponent.SliderBar.MACBorderStyle.Bump
member.summary: The inner and outer edges of the border have a raised appearance.

member.name: F:XComponent.SliderBar.MACBorderStyle.Etched
member.summary: The inner and outer edges of the border have an etched appearance.

member.name: F:XComponent.SliderBar.MACBorderStyle.Flat
member.summary: The border has no three-dimensional effects.

member.name: F:XComponent.SliderBar.MACBorderStyle.Raised
member.summary: The border has raised inner and outer edges.

member.name: F:XComponent.SliderBar.MACBorderStyle.RaisedInner
member.summary: The border has a raised inner edge and no outer edge.

member.name: F:XComponent.SliderBar.MACBorderStyle.RaisedOuter
member.summary: The border has a raised outer edge and no inner edge.

member.name: F:XComponent.SliderBar.MACBorderStyle.Sunken
member.summary: The border has sunken inner and outer edges.

member.name: F:XComponent.SliderBar.MACBorderStyle.SunkenInner
member.summary: The border has a sunken inner edge and no outer edge.

member.name: F:XComponent.SliderBar.MACBorderStyle.SunkenOuter
member.summary: The border has a sunken outer edge and no inner edge.

member.summary: Constructor method of class

member.name: P:XComponent.SliderBar.MACTrackBar.AutoSize
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the height or width of the track bar is being automatically sized.
member.remarks: You can set the AutoSize property to true to cause the track bar to adjust either its height or width, depending on orientation, to ensure that the control uses only the required amount of space.
member.value: true if the track bar is being automatically sized; otherwise, false. The default is true.

member.name: P:XComponent.SliderBar.MACTrackBar.LargeChange
member.summary: Gets or sets a value to be added to or subtracted from the property when the slider is moved a large distance.
member.remarks: When the user presses the PAGE UP or PAGE DOWN key or clicks the track bar on either side of the slider, the property changes according to the value set in the property. You might consider setting the value to a percentage of the (for a vertically oriented track bar) or (for a horizontally oriented track bar) values. This keeps the distance your track bar moves proportionate to its size.
member.value: A numeric value. The default value is 2.

member.name: P:XComponent.SliderBar.MACTrackBar.SmallChange
member.summary: Gets or sets a value to be added to or subtracted from the property when the slider is moved a small distance.
member.remarks: When the user presses one of the arrow keys, the property changes according to the value set in the SmallChange property. You might consider setting the value to a percentage of the (for a vertically oriented track bar) or (for a horizontally oriented track bar) values. This keeps the distance your track bar moves proportionate to its size.
member.value: A numeric value. The default value is 1.

member.name: P:XComponent.SliderBar.MACTrackBar.TrackLineHeight
member.summary: Gets or sets the height of track line.

member.name: P:XComponent.SliderBar.MACTrackBar.TickColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the tick's of the control.

member.name: P:XComponent.SliderBar.MACTrackBar.TickFrequency
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that specifies the delta between ticks drawn on the control.
member.remarks: For a with a large range of values between the and the , it might be impractical to draw all the ticks for values on the control. For example, if you have a control with a range of 100, passing in a value of five here causes the control to draw 20 ticks. In this case, each tick represents five units in the range of values.
member.value: The numeric value representing the delta between ticks. The default is 1.

member.name: P:XComponent.SliderBar.MACTrackBar.TickHeight
member.summary: Gets or sets the height of tick.
member.value: The height of tick in pixels. The default value is 2.

member.name: P:XComponent.SliderBar.MACTrackBar.IndentHeight
member.summary: Gets or sets the height of indent (or Padding-Y).
member.value: The height of indent in pixels. The default value is 6.

member.name: P:XComponent.SliderBar.MACTrackBar.IndentWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the width of indent (or Padding-Y).
member.value: The width of indent in pixels. The default value is 6.

member.name: P:XComponent.SliderBar.MACTrackBar.TrackerSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the tracker's size. The tracker's width must be greater or equal to tracker's height.
member.value: The object that represents the height and width of the tracker in pixels.

member.name: P:XComponent.SliderBar.MACTrackBar.TextTickStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the text tick style of the trackbar. There are 4 styles for selection: None, TopLeft, BottomRight, Both.
member.remarks: You can use the , properties to customize the tick text.
member.value: One of the values. The default is BottomRight.

member.name: P:XComponent.SliderBar.MACTrackBar.TickStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the tick style of the trackbar. There are 4 styles for selection: None, TopLeft, BottomRight, Both.
member.remarks: You can use the , , properties to customize the trackbar's ticks.
member.value: One of the values. The default is BottomRight.

member.name: P:XComponent.SliderBar.MACTrackBar.TrackerColor
member.summary: Gets or set tracker's color.
member.value: You can change size of tracker by property. A that represents the color of the tracker.

member.name: P:XComponent.SliderBar.MACTrackBar.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets a numeric value that represents the current position of the slider on the track bar.
member.remarks: The Value property contains the number that represents the current position of the slider on the track bar.
member.value: A numeric value that is within the and range. The default value is 0.

member.name: P:XComponent.SliderBar.MACTrackBar.Minimum
member.summary: Gets or sets the lower limit of the range this is working with.
member.remarks: You can use the method to set both the and properties at the same time.
member.value: The minimum value for the . The default value is 0.

member.name: P:XComponent.SliderBar.MACTrackBar.Maximum
member.summary: Gets or sets the upper limit of the range this is working with.
member.remarks: You can use the method to set both the and properties at the same time.
member.value: The maximum value for the . The default value is 10.

member.name: P:XComponent.SliderBar.MACTrackBar.Orientation
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the horizontal or vertical orientation of the track bar.
member.remarks: When the Orientation property is set to Orientation.Horizontal, the slider moves from left to right as the increases. When the Orientation property is set to Orientation.Vertical, the slider moves from bottom to top as the increases.
member.value: One of the values. The default value is Horizontal.

member.name: P:XComponent.SliderBar.MACTrackBar.BorderStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the border type of the trackbar control.
member.value: A that represents the border type of the trackbar control. The default is MACBorderStyle.None.

member.name: P:XComponent.SliderBar.MACTrackBar.BorderColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the border color of the control.
member.value: A object that represents the border color of the control.

member.name: P:XComponent.SliderBar.MACTrackBar.TrackLineColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of the track line.
member.value: A object that represents the color of the track line.

member.summary: Gets the Size of area need for drawing.

summary.para: MACTrackBar represents an advanced track bar that is very better than the standard trackbar.

MACTrackBar supports the following features:
MAC style, Office2003 style, IDE2003 style and Plain style.
Vertical and Horizontal trackbar.
Supports many Text Tick styles: None, TopLeft, BottomRight, Both. You can change Text Font, ForeColor.
Supports many Tick styles: None, TopLeft, BottomRight, Both.
You can change , , .
You can change and .
You can change and .
Easy to Use and Integrate in Visual Studio .NET.
100% compatible to the standard control in VS.NET.
100% managed code.
No coding RAD component.
